snippet: Rabbi Joseph Raksin, who was visiting family in Florida, was killed while walking to a synagogue.
abstract: Rabbi Joseph Raksin of Brooklyn, visiting family in Miami, is shot and killed while walking to a synagogue in what appears to have been a botched robbery.
lead_paragraph: Rabbi Joseph Raksin, who was visiting family in Florida, was killed while walking to a synagogue.

headline.main: Rabbi From Brooklyn Is Fatally Shot in Miami
headline.print_headline: Rabbi From Brooklyn Is Fatally Shot in Miami
